author: Paul J. Davies
title: Why Prudential Is Betting Retirees Won’t Keep Living Longer
text:
Curious as it sounds, Prudential Financial is rapidly gaining a big exposure to the health and well-being of British retirees.
The U.S. life and annuity group, the nation’s second-biggest after MetLife, has been showing a world-beating appetite for taking on risks that current and future U.K. pensioners live longer than expected.
This so-called...
